entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High 8.

entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Snow level rising to 1700 metres in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h.
